page.title: 04HEALTH 1
page.content:
Towcester is a{small rural town}in the middle of a{farming community. Towcester's{health and shopping facilities therefore cover a large area as they include the surrounding villages. The health centre is based in {Swinneyford Road}and is made up of{2} practices. In total, there are{9} doctors who work in{7}rooms.
{THE PRIMARY HEALTH CARE TEAM} There are a variety of nurses who work at the centre:- District nurses, Treatment nurses, Midwives, Health visitors and a school nurse.
{THE MIDWIFE:}her job is to look after babies for the first{8}days of their lives. Some midwives deliver babies for parents if they cannot make it to the hospital.
